//131 Advance_and_Secure Advance_and_Secure Advance_and_Secure Advance_and_Secure Advance_and_Secure Advance_and_Secure Суть игры режима AAS Advance_and_Secure

//131 Die Offensive und Schutz (AAS). Dies ist ein Kampf um die Kontrolle von Gebieten, die von Alpha zu Foxtrot (oder mehr), um in einer sequentiellen Reihenfolge eingesetzt werden. Die Anzeige auf der rechten Seite zeigt Rechtecke mit Buchstaben (rot (RF), blau (Vereinigte Staaten) und Grün (neytralnye)). Ihr Team muss ihre eigene Zone zu verteidigen und gleichzeitig den Feind anzugreifen Bereich, aber nur die Bereiche, die in den Briefen des Rechtecks ​​buchstabiert sind. Seit Beginn der Mission ist jede Mannschaft in der Position für mindestens 3 Zonen.

Um den Feind Zone Protokoll zu erfassen (zu fahren, Fliegen) am Umfang der Zone, mit den Kämpfern des Teams, mehr als Soldaten des Feindes (die Zahl der Männer-Teams werden in den Kästen dargestellt) sein. Während der Aufnahme erscheint am oberen Ende der Skala, die eine Abnahme ist. Sobald die Waage geht auf Null Prozent ist erforderlich, um ein Kämpfer des Teams ging an die Fahne zu sein. Dann wird die Fläche unter Ihrer Kontrolle zu kommen, und die Skala wird die Farbe ändern und steigen. Sobald die Waage verloren - Ihr Gebiet ist vollständig unter Kontrolle - wird in diesem Bereich respawnen. Wenn Sie zu töten, können Sie entweder warten, bis der Arzt, der sie belebt, oder Sie können eine beliebige Stelle in der Wiederbelebung der Fläche unter Ihrer Kontrolle zu wählen.

Je mehr Menschen wiedergeboren in der Gegend ist, desto länger wird der Ort für die Wiederbelebung bzw. warten mehr respawnen. In der Regel im Bereich der X-Ray ist eine Menge Technik, sondern um aus diesem Bereich zu bekommen, ist weit entfernt von der Kampfzone. Waffen wechseln Sie in das Feld mit der Waffe in der Mitte jeder Zone an der Flagge mit den folgenden Klassen zu gehen, und wählen Sie aus dem Menü-Option: Soldat, Soldat (SOEs), Heavy, Medic, Soldier (RPG), Fighter (MANPADS) Sniper, Scout a Výsadkář.

Exportiert BBQ und LEGYICH. Besten Dank und Kredit an CoolBox-SBS- [AAS Founder], Kju, Cat Toaster, Xeno, Norrin, Wormeaten, Monsada [UPSMON], Aeroson, Lenya Golikov, ASSA, JahLive, [HA]Galactic und Respekt für die ganze AAS Gemeinde

This is Advance And Secure. Fight for control of the string of bases, Alpha through Zulu, which must be taken sequential order. The display on the top right of your screen shows the two contested bases. You must defend your own, and simultaneously attack the enemy's. Each team starts in control of three bases.

In order to seize the enemy base you must enter the outer perimeter, and outnumber the enemy until the base capture bar reaches zero. You must then get at least one soldier within 10m of the central flag to complete the capture.

When you die, you can wait to be revived by a team-mate, or you can respawn at any base fully camped by your team. The more people spawning at a base, the longer you will have to queue. Your X-Ray base has the most vehicles, but is the furthest away. Visit the armoury near each base flag, to select between the quick loadouts of Rifleman, Grenadier, Gunner scope, Gunner, Medic, Thrower, Mid AT, Heavy AT, Anti Air, Sniper, Recon, Sapper and Paratrooper. Alternatively, use the gear menu to choose your own loadout.

Edited by BBQ and LEGYICH. Special Thanks and Credit to CoolBox-SBS- [AAS Founder], Kju, Cat Toaster, Xeno, Norrin, Wormeaten, Monsada [UPSMON], Aeroson, Lenya Golikov, ASSA, JahLive, [HA]Galactic and the rest of the AAS community

Režim hry Dobít a chránit (Advance and secure - AAS). Jedná se o boj kdy musíte dobít oblast a poté jí ubránit. Oblasti Alfa až Foxtrot (nebo i více), které mají být získány v postupném pořadí. Na displeji se vpravo v obdélníku zobrazují písmena (červená (RF), modrá (USA) a zelené (neutrální). Váš tým musí hájit svou vlastní zónu a zároveň útočit a získat další nepřátelskou, ale pouze ty oblasti, které jsou zobrazeny v obdélníku.

Jednoduše řečeno postupujete abecedně Alpha, Bravo, Charlie, Delta, Echo, Foxtrot, Hotel, India hrajete-li za USA (modrou), nebo v opačném pořadí pokud hrajete za RF (červená).

Na začátku mise, má každý tým své pozice a začíná získáním neobsazené pozice ve středu a nebo rovnou útočením na abecedně nejbližší pozici protivníka. Pro získání sektoru nepřítale musíte zlikvidovat jeho členy, kteří jsou na pozici v kruhovém sektoru a nebo je početně přečíslit. Jakmile to dokážete, začnou se zobrazovat procenta ze 100% do 0% a pak můžete dojít k praporu a získat sektor. Tím ale nemáte vyhráno protože musíte sektor udržet dokud z 0% na 100% nenaběhne barva vašeho týmu pro kompletní získání sektoru.

Nestačí tedy jen přihlížet z dálky ale je potřeba bojovat a vstoupit do sektoru! Po získání 100% sektoru barvou vašeho týmu je sektor Váš a funguje na něm RESPAWN. Když jste raněni, můžete buď počkat na lékaře, který vás ošetří, nebo si můžete vybrat libovolný sektor pro respawn. Můžete také na skladišti zbraní v sektoru (zelené bedny) otočit kolečkem myši a zvolit "Heal..." vyléčení. Respawn (oživení) probíhá v pořadí, ve kterém jste vstoupili do "fronty" pro respawn. Čím více hráčů, tam je tím déle čekáte a proto je někdy výhodnější oživit se na předchozí pozici a dojet třeba motorkou na bojiště.

Nejvíce bojové techniky je v oblasti X-Ray (základna), ale ta je také nejdále od frontové linie. Chcete-li změnit zbraně, běžte k zeleným bednám uprostřed každé zóny poblíž vlajky. Tam zamiřte na zelené bedny a otáčejte kolečkem myší. To vyvolá menu pro výběr třídy bojovníka (Ctrl+C) a výběr jeho zbraně (Ctrl+D). Minimapu ovládáte Ctrl+Z a Ctrl+X. Vzdálenost, na kterou jsou viditelné jména vašich spolubojovníků upravujete Ctrl+T. Váš tým má nad sebou zeleným textem napsána jména. Do těch nestřílíme! Nestřílíme ani na nepřátelskou základnu X-Ray!

Editoval BBQ a LEGYICH. Zvláštní poděkování CoolBox-SBS- [AAS Founder], Kju, Cat Toaster, Xeno, Norrin, Wormeaten, Monsada [UPSMON], Aeroson, ASSA, JahLive, [HA]Galactic A dodržování celé společenství AAS

Наступление и Защита (AAS) - Это борьба за контроль над зонами от Alpha до Zulu (или ранее), которые должны быть заняты в последовательном порядке. На дисплее справа показаны прямоугольники с литерами (красные (РФ), синие(США) и зеленые(нейтральные)). Ваша команда должна защищать свою собственную зону и одновременно атаковать зону противника, но ТОЛЬКО те зоны, литеры которых прописаны в прямоугольниках. С начала миссии каждая команда имеет в расположении как минимум 3 зоны.

Для того, чтобы захватить вражескую зону необходимо войти (въехать, влететь) в периметр зоны, при этом бойцов вашей команды должно быть больше, чем бойцов противника (количество бойцов команд показаны в прямоугольниках). Во время захвата вверху появляется шкала, которая идет на уменьшение. Как только шкала дойдет до нуля процентов необходимо, что бы боец вашей команды подошел к флагу. Тогда зона перейдет под ваш контроль, при этом шкала поменяет цвет и начнет увеличиваться. Как только шкала пропадет - ваша зона под полным контролем - появится точка возрождения в этой зоне.

Когда Вас убьют Вы можете либо дождаться медика, который вас реанимирует, либо выбрать точку возрождения в любой зоне, находящейся под вашим контролем. Чем больше людей возрождаются в зоне, тем длиннее становится очередь на возрождение, соответственно дольше ждать респаун. Как правило в зоне X-Ray находится много техники, но добираться отсюда до мест сражений далеко. Что бы сменить вооружение вы можете подойти к ящику с оружием, находящемуся в центре каждой зоны у флага и выбрать из появившегося меню опцию со следующими классами:
Боец, Боец (ГП), Пулеметчик ПСО, Пулеметчик, Санитар, Боец (РШГ-2/MAAWS), Боец (РПГ-7/MAAWS), Боец (ПТРК), Боец (ПЗРК), Снайпер, Разведчик, Сапер и Десантник.

Advance And Secure is tactical: luck is not a factor!

//131 For effective use of mortars, they must be used from an even horizontal surface. A ballistic computer uses many parameters, such as elevation, corrections for the angle of the earth's inclination, the height of the mortar setting relative to the height of the target, and so on. In our case, instead of azimuth, we use the mark placed on the map. The center of the optical sight should be kept on it, and the elevation should be taken from the tables. Moreover, we must take into account the power of the charge (CHARGE) for different ranges. The Reds have 3, the blue ones have 5. The other parameters are not taken into account, so a good scout-gunner is needed, which will prompt where to adjust the fire. The fire will be a little longer, but it all depends on the experience. Elevation can be configured with the keys Page Up/Page Down. NOTICE: CLOSED = CHARGE 1, MEDIUM = CHARGE 2, FAR = CHARGE 3 For effective use of mortars, they must be used from an even horizontal surface. NOTICE: CLOSED = CHARGE 1, MEDIUM = CHARGE 2, FAR = CHARGE 3 Для эффективного использования минометов необходимо ими пользоваться с ровной горизонтальной поверхности. Баллистический компьютер использует много параметров, такие как возвышение, поправки на угол наклона земли, высота установки миномета относительо высоты цели и проч. В нашем случае вместо азимута мы используем метку, поставленную на карту. Центр оптического прицела надо держать на ней, а возвышение брать из таблиц. Причем, надо учитывать мощность заряда (CHARGE) на разные дальности. У Красных их 3, у синих 5. Остальные параметры не учитываются, поэтому нужен хороший разведчик-наводчик, который подскажет куда корректировать огонь. Пристреленивание будет несколько дольше, но все зависит от опыта. Возвышение регулируеся кнопками Page Up/Page Down. Примечание: БЛИЗКО = CHARGE 1, СРЕДНЕ = CHARGE 2, ДАЛЕКО = CHARGE 3 For effective use of mortars, they must be used from an even horizontal surface. Key.German:
AAS OBJECTIVE:
Despite both X-Ray Homebases of each team, there are several objectives that need to be conquered in order. A Team wins if it captures all Objectives or owns more than the opponent at the end of a given amount of time.

AAS HISTORY:
Advance And Secure was created in Arma1 by CoolBox-SBS- and perfected by Kju and Cat Toaster through to Arma2OA. Ported to ArmA'3 by BBQ and LEGYICH!
Editing by LEGYICH, Golikov, ASSA and ARMA2.RU Community

Key.Italian:
AAS OBJECTIVE:
Despite both X-Ray Homebases of each team, there are several objectives that need to be conquered in order. A Team wins if it captures all Objectives or owns more than the opponent at the end of a given amount of time.

AAS HISTORY:
Advance And Secure was created in Arma1 by CoolBox-SBS- and perfected by Kju and Cat Toaster through to Arma2OA. Ported to ArmA'3 by BBQ and LEGYICH!
Editing by LEGYICH, Golikov, ASSA and ARMA2.RU Community

Key.Russian:
Об AAS:
Дойди до зоны X-Ray противника, захватывая зоны по пути в определенном порядке. Побеждает команда, захватившая все зоны противника до Х-Ray или захватившая больше целей за отведенное время.

ИСТОРИЯ AAS:
Advance And Secure (AAS) - Игровой режим Наступление и Защита придумал еще в Arma1 CoolBox-SBS-, а усовершенствовали Kju и Cat Toaster уже в Arma2 и OA. Экспортировали в ArmA'3 BBQ and LEGYICH!
Редакция A2RU - LEGYICH, Леня Голиков, АSSА и ARMA2.RU сообщество

Key.German: Use the armoury near the flag to select teams, player classes and Custom classes.
Key.English: Use the armoury near the flag to select teams, player classes and Custom classes.
Key.Italian: Use the armoury near the flag to select teams, player classes and Custom classes.
Key.Spanish: Use the armoury near the flag to select teams, player classes and Custom classes.
Key.French: Use the armoury near the flag to select teams, player classes and Custom classes.
Key.Czech: Use the armoury near the flag to select teams, player classes and Custom classes.

Key.Hungarian: Use the armoury near the flag to select teams, player classes and Custom classes.

Key.German: When you respawn you join a queue; if the queue is too long, spawn further back.
Key.English: When you respawn you join a queue; if the queue is too long, spawn further back.
Key.Italian: When you respawn you join a queue; if the queue is too long, spawn further back.
Key.Spanish: When you respawn you join a queue; if the queue is too long, spawn further back.
Key.French: When you respawn you join a queue; if the queue is too long, spawn further back.
Key.Czech: When you respawn you join a queue; if the queue is too long, spawn further back.
Key.Russian: Возрождаясь, становишься в очередь. Если очередь слишком длинная - выбери другую зону.
Key.Hungarian: When you respawn you join a queue; if the queue is too long, spawn further back.

Key.German: Outnumber the enemy in their zone in order to capture the flag.
Key.English: Outnumber the enemy in their zone in order to capture the flag.
Key.Italian: Outnumber the enemy in their zone in order to capture the flag.
Key.Spanish: Outnumber the enemy in their zone in order to capture the flag.
Key.French: Outnumber the enemy in their zone in order to capture the flag.
Key.Czech: Outnumber the enemy in their zone in order to capture the flag.
Key.Russian: Для захвата зоны, игроков твоей команды в зоне должно быть больше.
Key.Hungarian: Outnumber the enemy in their zone in order to capture the flag.

Key.German: Once an enemy base is de-camped, get out of your vehicle and within 10m of the flag to capture it.
Key.English: Once an enemy base is de-camped, get out of your vehicle and within 10m of the flag to capture it.
Key.Italian: Once an enemy base is de-camped, get out of your vehicle and within 10m of the flag to capture it.
Key.Spanish: Once an enemy base is de-camped, get out of your vehicle and within 10m of the flag to capture it.
Key.French: Once an enemy base is de-camped, get out of your vehicle and within 10m of the flag to capture it.
Key.Czech: Once an enemy base is de-camped, get out of your vehicle and within 10m of the flag to capture it.
Key.Russian: Как только вражеская зона отжата, выйди из техники и подойди к флагу, чтобы захватить зону.
Key.Hungarian: Once an enemy base is de-camped, get out of your vehicle and within 10m of the flag to capture it.

Key.German: You can find more vehicles and armour at X-Ray, but you have further to drive.
Key.English: You can find more vehicles and armour at X-Ray, but you have further to drive.
Key.Italian: You can find more vehicles and armour at X-Ray, but you have further to drive.
Key.Spanish: You can find more vehicles and armour at X-Ray, but you have further to drive.
Key.French: You can find more vehicles and armour at X-Ray, but you have further to drive.
Key.Czech: You can find more vehicles and armour at X-Ray, but you have further to drive.
Key.Russian: Обычно в зоне X-Ray много техники, но оттуда далеко добираться.
Key.Hungarian: You can find more vehicles and armour at X-Ray, but you have further to drive.

Key.German: Use the distance meters in the top right to see how close you are to a base.
Key.English: Use the distance meters in the top right to see how close you are to a base.
Key.Italian: Use the distance meters in the top right to see how close you are to a base.
Key.Spanish: Use the distance meters in the top right to see how close you are to a base.
Key.French: Use the distance meters in the top right to see how close you are to a base.
Key.Czech: Use the distance meters in the top right to see how close you are to a base.
Key.Russian: Прямоугольники справа информируют о зонах захвата/удержания, количестве в них бойцов и расстоянии до них.
Key.Hungarian: Use the distance meters in the top right to see how close you are to a base.

Key.German: Keep an eye on the numbers within your home base, to spot when it is attacked.
Key.English: Keep an eye on the numbers within your home base, to spot when it is attacked.
Key.Italian: Keep an eye on the numbers within your home base, to spot when it is attacked.
Key.Spanish: Keep an eye on the numbers within your home base, to spot when it is attacked.
Key.French: Keep an eye on the numbers within your home base, to spot when it is attacked.
Key.Czech: Keep an eye on the numbers within your home base, to spot when it is attacked.
Key.Russian: Выходя с крайней зоны в атаку, убедись, что ее кто-то защищает. Иначе, оставайся в обороне.
Key.Hungarian: Keep an eye on the numbers within your home base, to spot when it is attacked.

Key.German: Revive friendly soldiers using the 'Revive' option from the action menu.
Key.English: Revive friendly soldiers using the 'Revive' option from the action menu.
Key.Italian: Revive friendly soldiers using the 'Revive' option from the action menu.
Key.Spanish: Revive friendly soldiers using the 'Revive' option from the action menu.
Key.French: Revive friendly soldiers using the 'Revive' option from the action menu.
Key.Czech: Revive friendly soldiers using the 'Revive' option from the action menu.
Key.Russian: Санитары могут возродить павших бойцов, с помощью опции 'Реанимировать' в меню действий.
Key.Hungarian: Revive friendly soldiers using the 'Revive' option from the action menu.

Key.German: Try a synchronised attack on the enemy base to gain the element of surprise.
Key.English: Try a synchronised attack on the enemy base to gain the element of surprise.
Key.Italian: Try a synchronised attack on the enemy base to gain the element of surprise.
Key.Spanish: Try a synchronised attack on the enemy base to gain the element of surprise.
Key.French: Try a synchronised attack on the enemy base to gain the element of surprise.
Key.Czech: Try a synchronised attack on the enemy base to gain the element of surprise.

Key.Hungarian: Try a synchronised attack on the enemy base to gain the element of surprise.

Key.German: Keep together with your team-mates to survive and revive each other.
Key.English: Keep together with your team-mates to survive and revive each other.
Key.Italian: Keep together with your team-mates to survive and revive each other.
Key.Spanish: Keep together with your team-mates to survive and revive each other.
Key.French: Keep together with your team-mates to survive and revive each other.
Key.Czech: Keep together with your team-mates to survive and revive each other.

Key.Hungarian: Keep together with your team-mates to survive and revive each other.

Key.German: If you are a medic and save a custom loadout, you lose your medic class and cannot revive.
Key.English: If you are a medic and save a custom loadout, you lose your medic class and cannot revive.
Key.Italian: If you are a medic and save a custom loadout, you lose your medic class and cannot revive.
Key.Spanish: If you are a medic and save a custom loadout, you lose your medic class and cannot revive.

Key.Hungarian: If you are a medic and save a custom loadout, you lose your medic class and cannot revive.

Key.German: If you can't fight your way in through a bottleneck, a well-placed satchel can make a new entrance!
Key.English: If you can't fight your way in through a bottleneck, a well-placed satchel can make a new entrance!
Key.Italian: If you can't fight your way in through a bottleneck, a well-placed satchel can make a new entrance!

Key.Hungarian: If you can't fight your way in through a bottleneck, a well-placed satchel can make a new entrance!

Key.German: To zoom the minimap in and out, use CTRL+Z and CTRL+X.
Key.English: To zoom the minimap in and out, use CTRL+Z and CTRL+X.

Key.Spanish: Keep an eye on the minimap to see where your teammates are.
